Package com.kormapper.annotation

Class AnnotationReflector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kormapper.annotation.AnnotationReflector

  • public class AnnotationReflector
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides informationen about the Annotations wich are instructed by the KOR-Guidelines
    Author:
    leonhardmuellauer

                                                                 throws KORException
        Returns the name-value of a annotated field and the corresponding field-value as a HashMap

        object - in which the columns are searched
        Returns:
        a filled or empty HashMap
        Throws:
        KORException - when a primary key is null

        public java.lang.String tableNameOf​(java.lang.Object object)

        Returns:

      • runGetter

        public static java.lang.Object runGetter​(java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                                         java.lang.Object reference)
        Returns the value of the corresponding get-method of a field in the given object
        Parameters:
        field - the corresponding field of the get-method
        reference - the object in which the get-method should be invoken
        Returns:
        the value of the field wrapped in a object or null

      • runSetter

        public static void runSetter​(java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                             java.lang.Object reference,
                             java.lang.Object value)
        Returns the value of the corresponding set-method of a field in the given object
        Parameters:
        field - the corresponding field of the set-method
        reference - the object in which the set-method should be invoken
        value - the value that should be passed onto the set-method

      • fieldOf

        public static java.lang.reflect.Field fieldOf​(java.lang.String colName,
                                              java.lang.Object reference)
        Returns the field wich is annotated by column and equals the given colName
        Parameters:
        colName - search condition for the field
        reference - in which the search occurs
        Returns:
        the field or null
